sourcesContent:
import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../HeaderPage/Header"; import Footer from "../Footer/Footer"; import data from "../../data"; import "./Home.css"; import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { AppContext } from "./AppProvider"; const Home = () => { const { List, testimonials } = data; const { Featuredproducts } = useContext(AppContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleProductClick = (product) => { navigate(`/product/${product.id}`, { state: { product } }); }; return (

Give your Workout
a new Style!

Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistet
hard work gains Success. Greatness will come.

Explore Now
{/* */}

Featured Products

{Featuredproducts.map((product) => (
handleProductClick(product)} src={product.image} alt="" />

{product.name}

{Array.from({ length: product.rating }).map((_, index) => ( ))}
price: ${product.price}
))}
{/* Latest Products */}

Latest Products

{List.map((product) => (
handleProductClick(product)} src={product.image} alt="" />

{product.name}

{Array.from({ length: product.rating }).map((_, index) => ( ))}
price: $ {product.price}
))}
{/* */}

Exclusively available

Smart band 4

The Mi Smart Band 4 features a 39.9% larger (than Mi Band 3) AMOLED color full touch display with adjustable brightness, so everything is clear as can be. Buy Now
{/* */}
{testimonials.map((testimonial) => (

{testimonial.quote}

{testimonial.rating.map((star, index) => ( ))}

{testimonial.name}

))}
{/* */}
); }; export default Home;
